snippet: Peyton Manning faced off against Tom Brady for the first time as a member of the Broncos, but it was Brady’s Patriots that managed to suffocate Denver’s defense to win Sunday.
abstract: New England Patriots defeat Denver Broncos, 31-21; an anticipated passing duel between Patriots quarterback Tom Brady and Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning never materializes.
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning faced off against Tom Brady for the first time as a member of the Broncos, but it was Brady’s Patriots that managed to suffocate Denver’s defense to win Sunday.

headline.seo: Tom Brady and Patriots Top Peyton Manning and Broncos
headline.main: Patriots Play Keep-Away for Victory Over Manning
headline.print_headline: Brady and Patriots Play Keep-Away To Register Victory Over Manning
